description: Displays instructions and presents a predefined list of responses for the operator to choose from, optionally auto-finishing when a response button is clicked.
intent: To present guidance or questions to the operator and capture their choice from a set of configured responses.

conditions: Instructions and response choices have been configured during authoring

example_usage: Operator selects an item from the drop-down (or clicks a response button if Auto Finish on Selection was enabled) and then clicks Finish to complete the phase, providing a signature if required.
